name: A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing (Dajay Rae)
name_original: A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing (Dajay Rae)
description:
Play as a wolf with the ability to shapeshift into a sheep. Befriend other sheep, help them escape the forest or gobble them up to satisfy your hunger. Inspired by Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde, the player must make decisions based on their morals whether or not they wish to help NPCs along the way. With positives and negatives for both characters, the choice is yours. However, if you do decide to eat them, then you might end up being the big bad lonely wolf...

Credits:

Saheed - https://saheedkazeem.itch.io/

Thea - https://itch.io/profile/thea-blurton

Lera
